oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Fan Fair Reunion Show - Tape 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 3 of 3. Recording of the 1980 Fan Fair Reunion Show. Featuring Hugh Cherry (host), Clyde Foley Cummins (performer), Betty Foley Cummins (performer), and Stoneman Family (performers).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Clyde Julian Foley; Betty Foley-Cummins; Stoneman Family
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Introduction Tune [Unidentified] -- (00:18) Hugh Cherry introduces Betty Foley-Cummins and Clyde Julian Foley -- (01:12) As Far As I'm Concerned (Clyde Julian Foley and Betty Foley Cummins) -- (03:41) Hugh Cherry talks about family tradition and introduces The Stoneman Family -- (05:59) Goin' Up Cripple Creek (Stoneman Family) -- (08:10) Johnson Family addresses crowd -- (08:44) Five Little Johnson Girls (Stoneman Family) -- (11:12) Stoneman Family addresses their father's legacy -- (11:49) Somebodies Waiting For Me (Stoneman Family) -- (14:03) Stoneman Family introduces members and pays homage to father -- (15:55) -- Mama Don't Allow (Stoneman Family) -- (19:45) Hugh Cherry celebrates the Stoneman's performance and says closing remarks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Foley-Cummins, Betty; Foley, Clyde Julian, 1910-1968;
